original_text: When you were weary and worn out, they met you on your journey and attacked all who were lagging behind; they had no fear of God.
korean_text: 곧 그들이 너를 길에서 만나 네가 피곤할 때에 네 뒤에 떨어진 약한 자들을 쳤고 하나님을 두려워하지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: they met you on your journey
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너희의 여정 중에 너희를 만났고

sentences.original_text: and attacked all who were lagging behind
they had no fear of God
